ComicInfo.Penciller: Claudio Castellini,Ron Randall,Stefano Gaudiano,Ron Randall,Stefano Gaudiano,Claudio Castellini
ComicInfo.Summary: A Nazi commandant will risk anything to locate a hidden cache of gold, but when he finally finds it he also discovers that the treasure has a guardian . . . Ron Marz and Claudio Castellini put a new spin on Predator. Also in this issue: the explosive conclusion to The Ark and another chapter of My Vagabond Days by X-Men writer Steve Seagle and artist Stefano Gaudiano.
ComicInfo.Title: The Ark Part Four; My Vagabond Days; Demon's Gold
ComicInfo.Writer: Mark Verheiden,Steve Seagle,Ron Marz,Mark Verheiden,Steve Seagle,Ron Marz
